fasper
Class FasperException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          fasper.FasperException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComparisonException
public class FasperException
extends Exception

Main exception of this package. It contains a mechanism by which you can add new codes to the list of error codes. It should be used as it is or a inherited version in all customised parser activations, test activations etc. In fasper package this is the only kind of thrown exception. As an aditional feature you can encapsulate your exceptions in FasperException

See Also:
